title: AcAra vivahAram avaravar
sahitya:
AcAra vivahAram avaravar vITTilE aikkiyam vANDumaDA nATTilE


anupallavi

  nEsam koL shrI haridAsarukk-ulagellAm dEShamE uyirellAm deivap-prakAshamE


caraNam    nITTalum mazhittalum neTriyait-tITTlum kUTTalum kazhittalum kATTip-payanenna
vATTaminri mana nATTamonri gItai kATTum vazhiyilE kUTTuravuDan vAzhvOm
